ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would highly recommend the course to other students. The institutions literature is more interesting than you might think, and you will learn a lot.

I would recommend this course to other students, especially those interested in American politics. In this course, you are introduced to the implications and structures of different institutions in American politics.
I would recommend this course to anyone who wants to pass the American Politics qual and doesn't want to read about institutions on their own.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Deepened my knowledge by introducing me to canonical works, and recent papers, that are foundational to the field. I might have had some good research ideas come out of it, only time will tell, but a couple of the ideas on my short list for second year paper topics came out of this course
